text: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا
translation: (48) Look how they strike for you comparisons;[750] but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.
footnotes: [750]- Describing the Prophet (ﷺ) as a poet, a madman or one under the influence of sorcery.
